body.ab: <lb n="c56-0031__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0031.07" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 5<lb n="c56-0031__main__2"/> From this day natural philosophy and parti<lb n="c56-0031__main__3"/>cularly chemistry became <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nearly my sole <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6160"/>appli<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6160"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__4"/> study. I read with ardour <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6165"/>m<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6165"/> those books <lb n="c56-0031__main__5"/> so full of genius and discrimination <lb n="c56-0031__main__6"/><mdel>th</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6178"/>at have been written<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6178"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> enquirers on these sub<lb n="c56-0031__main__7"/>jects. I attended the lectures, and culti<lb n="c56-0031__main__8"/>vated the acquaintance of the men <lb n="c56-0031__main__9"/> of science of the university; and I found <lb n="c56-0031__main__10"/> even in M<shi rend="underline"></shi> Krempe a great deal <lb n="c56-0031__main__11"/> of sound sense & real information <lb n="c56-0031__main__12"/> combined it is true with a repulsive <lb n="c56-0031__main__13"/> phisiognomy & manners, but not on <lb n="c56-0031__main__14"/> that account the less valuable. <lb n="c56-0031__main__15"/> In M. Waldman I found a true friend. <lb n="c56-0031__main__16"/> His gentleness was never tinged by <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6232"/>dg<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6232"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__17"/> dogmatism and his instructions were <lb n="c56-0031__main__18"/> given with an air of frankness and <lb n="c56-0031__main__19"/> good nature that banished every idea <lb n="c56-0031__main__20"/> of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6247"/>pedantl<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6247"/> pedantry. It was perhaps the <lb n="c56-0031__main__21"/> amiable character of this man that <lb n="c56-0031__main__22"/> enclined me more to the study of that <lb n="c56-0031__main__23"/> branch of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6258"/>science<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6258"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>natural philosophy which he professed than an intrinsic <lb n="c56-0031__main__24"/> love for the science itself. But this <lb n="c56-0031__main__25"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0031.03">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__left_margin__d2e6291"/>circumstance<del eID="c56-0031__left_margin__d2e6291"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__3"/><mdel/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__left_margin__d2e6303"/>was had<del eID="c56-0031__left_margin__d2e6303"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__4"/> state of mind had <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__5"/> place <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6317"/>was<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6317"/> only in the first steps towards the <lb n="c56-0031__main__26"/> knowledge; <mdel>as</mdel>the more fully I entered <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6332"/>more fully<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6332"/> into <lb n="c56-0031__main__27"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6340"/>the<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6340"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6343"/>philosophy<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6343"/>science the more I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6352"/>studied<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6352"/><mdel/> pursued it <lb n="c56-0031__main__28"/> for its own sake. That application <lb n="c56-0031__main__29"/> which at first had been a matter <lb n="c56-0031__main__30"/> of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6371"/>ch<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6371"/> duty <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& resolution, now became so ardent <lb n="c56-0031__main__31"/> and eager that the stars often <lb n="c56-0031__main__32"/> dissapeared <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> in the light of <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> morning while I was yet <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0031__main__d2e6412"/>labouring<del eID="c56-0031__main__d2e6412"/>engaged<lb n="c56-0031__main__33"/> in my labrotary.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0032__main__1"/> As I applied so closely, it may be <lb n="c56-0032__main__2"/> easily conceived that I improved rapid<lb n="c56-0032__main__3"/>ly. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6443"/>It<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6443"/> My ardour was indeed the astonish<lb n="c56-0032__main__4"/>ment of the students, and my proficiency <lb n="c56-0032__main__5"/> that of the master. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6455"/>and<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6455"/> Professor Krempe <lb n="c56-0032__main__6"/> often asked me with a sly smile <lb n="c56-0032__main__7"/> how Cornelius Agrippa went on;<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> while M. Waldham <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> expressed the most <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> heartfelt exultation <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> in my progress. Two <lb n="c56-0032__main__8"/> years passed in this manner during <lb n="c56-0032__main__9"/> which I paid no visit to Geneva, but <lb n="c56-0032__main__10"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6499"/>ws<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6499"/> was engaged heart and soul in the <lb n="c56-0032__main__11"/> pursuit of some discoveries which I <lb n="c56-0032__main__12"/> hoped to make. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6506"/>No one<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6506"/> None but those <lb n="c56-0032__main__13"/> who have experienced it can conceive <lb n="c56-0032__main__14"/> of the enticements of science–<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6514"/>especially<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6514"/> In <lb n="c56-0032__main__15"/> other studies you go as far as others have <lb n="c56-0032__main__16"/><mdel>d</mdel>gone before you and there is nothing <lb n="c56-0032__main__17"/> more to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6535"/>learn<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6535"/><mdel>,</mdel>know, learn, but in a scientific <lb n="c56-0032__main__18"/> pursuit <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6547"/>their<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6547"/> there is continual <lb n="c56-0032__main__19"/> food for discovery and wonder. A mind <lb n="c56-0032__main__20"/> of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6554"/>even<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6554"/> moderate capacity who closely pursues <lb n="c56-0032__main__21"/> one study must infallibly arrive at <lb n="c56-0032__main__22"/> great proficiency in th<mdel>e</mdel>at study—And I <lb n="c56-0032__main__23"/> who <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6573"/>was<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6573"/> continually <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6578"/>applied to<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6578"/>sought the attainment of one <lb n="c56-0032__main__24"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6590"/>thing<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6590"/>object <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/>pursuit and was wra<mdel/>pt up <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6621"/>as I was<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6621"/> in this sole<lb n="c56-0032__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6630"/>I<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6630"/> improved so rapidly that at the end <lb n="c56-0032__main__26"/> of the two years I made <del next="#c-56.0032.07" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6635"/>one or two<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6635"/>some<lb n="c56-0032__main__27"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6644" xml:id="c56-0032.07"/>trifling<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6644"/> discoveries in the improvement <lb n="c56-0032__main__28"/> of some chemical <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6653"/>machines<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6653"/>instruments which pro<lb n="c56-0032__main__29"/>cured me great esteem and admiration <lb n="c56-0032__main__30"/> at the university. When I arrived at <lb n="c56-0032__main__31"/> this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>point, <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> and ha<mdel>v</mdel>d<mdel>ng</mdel> learned <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> all the professors <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> at Ingolstadt were <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> qualified to teach<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6704"/>that<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6704"/> m<mdel/>y residence <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0032__main__d2e6718"/>at In<del eID="c56-0032__main__d2e6718"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6733"/>golstadt was<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6733"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>there being no longer conducive to <lb n="c56-0033__main__2"/> my improvement, I thought of returning <lb n="c56-0033__main__3"/> to my friends and to my native town, <lb n="c56-0033__main__4"/> when an incident happened that <lb n="c56-0033__main__5"/> protracted my stay.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__6"/> One of those phænonoma which <lb n="c56-0033__main__7"/> had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6766"/>mo<mdel>re</mdel>st<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6766"/> peculiarly attracted my atten<lb n="c56-0033__main__8"/>tion was the structure of the human <lb n="c56-0033__main__9"/> frame; and indeed that of any animal <lb n="c56-0033__main__10"/> endued with life. Whence I often asked <lb n="c56-0033__main__11"/> myself did this principle of life proceed. <lb n="c56-0033__main__12"/> It was a bold question, and one <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6793"/>that<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6793"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>which<lb n="c56-0033__main__13"/> has ever been considered as a mystery. <lb n="c56-0033__main__14"/> Yet how many things are we on the <lb n="c56-0033__main__15"/> brink of becoming acquainted with <lb n="c56-0033__main__16"/> if cowardice or carelessness did <lb n="c56-0033__main__17"/> not restrain <mdel>us</mdel>our enquiries?. I revolved these circum<lb n="c56-0033__main__18"/>stances in my mind and determined <lb n="c56-0033__main__19"/> from thenceforth to apply myself more <lb n="c56-0033__main__20"/> particularly to th<mdel>at</mdel>ose branches of natural <lb n="c56-0033__main__21"/> philosophy which <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6854"/>treats<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6854"/><mdel>of</mdel> relate to phisiology. <lb n="c56-0033__main__22"/>Unless I had been animated by an al<lb n="c56-0033__main__23"/>most supernatural enthusiasm, my <lb n="c56-0033__main__24"/> application to this study would have <lb n="c56-0033__main__25"/> been irksome and almost intolerable. <lb n="c56-0033__main__26"/> To examine the causes of life <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6880"/>de<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6880"/> we must <lb n="c56-0033__main__27"/> first have <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6888"/>recou<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6888"/> recourse to death. <lb n="c56-0033__main__28"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0033__main__d2e6893"/>No is ano anatomy<del eID="c56-0033__main__d2e6893"/> I became acquainted <lb n="c56-0033__main__29"/> with the science of anatomy but this <lb n="c56-0033__main__30"/> was not sufficient. I must also observe <lb n="c56-0033__main__31"/> the natural decay & corruption of the <lb n="c56-0033__main__32"/> human body. In my education<lb n="c56-0034__main__1"/> my father had taken the greatest <lb n="c56-0034__main__2"/> precautions that my mind should <lb n="c56-0034__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6920"/>not<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6920"/> be impressed by ^no supernatural <lb n="c56-0034__main__4"/> horrors. I do not ever remember <lb n="c56-0034__main__5"/> having trembled at <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6939"/>a ghost story<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6939"/>tale of superstition or <lb n="c56-0034__main__6"/> to have feared the apparition of a spirit <lb n="c56-0034__main__7"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6954"/>Ligh<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6954"/> Darkness had no effect upon my <lb n="c56-0034__main__8"/> fancy and a churchyard was to <lb n="c56-0034__main__9"/> me merely ^as the receptacle of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6970"/>rotten b<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6970"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__10"/> bodies deprived of life and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6978"/>becoming<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6978"/>which<lb n="c56-0034__main__11"/> from being the seat of beauty &<lb n="c56-0034__main__12"/> strength ^become food for the worm. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e6998"/>But<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e6998"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__13"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7004"/>I <del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7004"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7007"/>A loathsome<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7007"/>c<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7013"/>But<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7013"/> now I was <lb n="c56-0034__main__14"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7020"/>obliged<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7020"/>led to examine the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7030"/>cause<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7030"/>cause& progress <lb n="c56-0034__main__15"/> of this decay and forced to spend days <lb n="c56-0034__main__16"/> and nights in vaults and Charnel <lb n="c56-0034__main__17"/> houses. I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7046"/>was obliged<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7046"/> My attention was <lb n="c56-0034__main__18"/> fixed upon every <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7054"/>horror of whic<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7054"/><mdel>h</mdel>object <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7062"/>calculated to<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7062"/>the most insupportable to the delicacy of<lb n="c56-0034__main__19"/> the human feelings. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7072"/>are suscept<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7072"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7075"/>able<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7075"/>– <lb n="c56-0034__main__20"/> I saw how the fine form of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7081"/>a<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7081"/> man <lb n="c56-0034__main__21"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7088"/>was<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7088"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7091"/>became<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7091"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/>was degraded and wasted. I beheld the <lb n="c56-0034__main__22"/> corruption of death succeed to the bloom<lb n="c56-0034__main__23"/>ing cheek of life – I saw how the wormsuc<lb n="c56-0034__main__24"/>ceeded toinherited the wonders of the eye and <lb n="c56-0034__main__25"/> brain. I paused, examin<mdel>ed</mdel>ing and anal<del rend="overwritten" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7145"/>yzed<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7145"/>yzing<lb n="c56-0034__main__26"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7155"/>every<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7155"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7158"/>minutiæ<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7158"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7161"/> of <del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7161"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0034__main__d2e7164"/>causation<del eID="c56-0034__main__d2e7164"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/> all the minutiæ <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__2"/> of causation <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__3"/> as exemplified in <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__4"/> the change from <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__5"/> life to death, &<lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__6"/> death to life, untill <lb n="c56-0034__main__27"/> from the midst of this darkness <lb n="c56-0034__main__28"/> a sudden light broke in upon me. <lb n="c56-0034__main__29"/> A light so brilliant & wondrous yet<lb n="c56-0035__main__1"/> so simple that while it intoxica<lb n="c56-0035__main__2"/>ted me<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__1"/> I became dizzy <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__2"/> with the immen<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__3"/>sity of the prospect <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__4"/> which it illus<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__5"/>trated, I was surprised that I <lb n="c56-0035__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7250"/>was<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7250"/> among so many men of genius <lb n="c56-0035__main__4"/> who had applied to the same science <lb n="c56-0035__main__5"/> that I alone should discover <lb n="c56-0035__main__6"/> this astonishing secret.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__7"/> Remember I am <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>not recording the <lb n="c56-0035__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7279"/>no<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7279"/> vision <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7282"/>of<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7282"/> of a madman – the <lb n="c56-0035__main__9"/> sun does not more certainly shine <lb n="c56-0035__main__10"/> in the heavens than that wh<mdel>at</mdel>ich<lb n="c56-0035__main__11"/> I now <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7300"/>record<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7300"/>affirm, is true. Some miracle <lb n="c56-0035__main__12"/> might have produced it. But the <lb n="c56-0035__main__13"/> stages of discovery were distinct <lb n="c56-0035__main__14"/> and probable. After days and nights <lb n="c56-0035__main__15"/> of incredible <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7318"/>toil<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7318"/>labour and fatigue <lb n="c56-0035__main__16"/> I succeeded in discovering the <lb n="c56-0035__main__17"/> cause of generation & life. Nay <lb n="c56-0035__main__18"/> more, I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7333"/>was<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7333"/>became myself capable of <lb n="c56-0035__main__19"/> bestowing animation upon lifeless <lb n="c56-0035__main__20"/> matter.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__21"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7349"/>My<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7349"/> The surprise <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0035__main__d2e7354"/>that<del eID="c56-0035__main__d2e7354"/>which I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>at firstexperienced <lb n="c56-0035__main__22"/> on this discovery soon gave place to <lb n="c56-0035__main__23"/> delight and rapture.
